encyclopedia.content: 单曲成就 2008.10 《Womanizer》580万张 （全球销量）全美目前突破300万张（持续更新）英文解释 [ 名词 ] 1. a man who likes many women and has short sexual relationships with them 【布兰妮新歌】==================================== 中文名称：好色之徒 所属专辑：circus 发行时间：2008年 歌手：Britney Spears 地区：美国 语言：英语 【歌词】====================================== 这个歌词是按引进版的歌词本打的

entry.tran: 玩弄女性的人;风流坯子;色鬼
entry.def: If you describe a man as a womanizer, you disapprove of him because he likes to have many short sexual relationships with women.

means.word_mean: 1. a man who likes many women and has short sexual relationships with them
与许多女子发生性关系的男子,玩弄女性的男子
